lead_paragraph: The family of Raymond Facey lamented the randomness and heartlessness of the shootings that left him and a Nassau County police officer dead.
snippet: The family of Raymond Facey lamented the randomness and heartlessness of the shootings that left him and a Nassau County police officer dead....

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and J. DAVID GOODMAN

headline.print_headline: A Conscientious Driver, a Gunman and a Fatal Encounter on L.I.
headline.main: A Conscientious Driver, a Gunman and a Fatal Encounter on L.I.
headline.seo: Family Mourns Raymond Facey, Killed by a Gunman on Long Island

abstract: Family of Raymond Facey lament randomness and heartlessness of shooting that left him and Nassau County Police Officer Arthur Lopez dead; Facey was making a phone call on the side of the Cross Island Parkway when Darrell Fuller, running from police after shooting Lopez, approached his car and shot him in the head.
